Name: ijsmanschap
Review Text: It was a very hot day. Actually, one of the first hot and sunny days of 2021. We took our inline skates and enjoyed the weather. Suddenly we both craved ice cream. I opened up google maps and searched for ice cream shops nearby. One was a ‚Ä¶

Name: ijsmanschap
Review Text: Handmade ice cream popsicles that has little different texture than standard ones. Fresh place and very kind owner.

Name: ijsmanschap
Review Text: Excellent coffee, they roast the beans themself and the flavour is subtle and balanced. Their croissants and ice cream is also top of the bill. Definite recommend and after getting your treats you can walk straight into the rembrandtpark to enjoy it in the sun and grass. 5/5 !

Name: ijsmanschap
Review Text: At IJsmanschap (roughly meaning "homage to ice cream") you can take the people making the popsicles there on their word. They really love and honor ice cream to make an excellent product, all in a convenient popsicle form to take with you ‚Ä¶

Name: ijsmanschap
Review Text: Amazing ice creams. Super original flavors. It is an explosion in your mouth. Creamy and fruitful, very different experiences. Grab several with a coffee and go for a walk around Rembrandtpark, you won‚Äôt regret it.

Name: ijsmanschap
Review Text:
Excellent icecreams and coffees.

Friendly service too. Can‚Äôt recommend enough!

Name: ijsmanschap
Review Text: Delicious handmade popsicles. Not  lot of flavours though. Opens during summer, thr fruit options are a nice call when the day is warm :)

Name: ijsmanschap
Review Text: Out of all the restaurants and cafe‚Äôs in the world, THIS IS MY FAVORITE. I adore this place. The coconut mango popsicle with dark chocolate and hazelnuts is the stuff of dreams (and one of the many vegan options!). I have a stamp card that ‚Ä¶

Review Text: I still haven't had a chance to try the ice creams but they don't know what a latte macchiato is, It hurt me to pay for three coffees that had nothing to do with what I ordered

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Such good ice cream, and such good coffee that they are forgiven for being too expensive. The coffee ice cream with sweet condensed milk scores not only with the taste, but also with the firm creamy mouthfeel that ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious and unique ice cream with many options to make it your own. In warm weather I always stop by IJsmanschap! ‚Ä¶

Name: ijsmanschap
Review Text: (Translated by Google) The best coffee and ice creams around, served by friendly staff. The homemade ice creams cost a bit more, but they are well worth it. They are generous portions with fresh ingredients. There are also tasty options for ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Fantastic shop with delicious home-made ice creams. You taste the love that is poured into it every time. And the staff is very friendly and helpful. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Very nice, but unfortunately very little choice. No warm Kaba and only croissants to eat. Coffee, on the other hand, tastes very good ‚Ä¶

Name: ijsmanschap
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Great ice cream. Topping finishes it off. Nuts were also tasty. Very expensive. 4 ice creams for ‚Ç¨ 18 incl 90ct for chocolate + nuts. There is another challenge to justify that. I miss that if I just buy an ice cream ‚Ä¶

Name: ijsmanschap
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Friendly gentleman behind the counter! Ice creams looked neat and tasty. My son received a cupcake piece of paper around his stick to prevent leaks, nice that little things like this have been thought about! The ‚Ä¶

Name: ijsmanschap
Review Text: (Translated by Google) I have been here 2 years ago. It's really a shame that I didn't come back sooner. A plus for me, however, is that they know how to make a delicious cappuccino. Many coffee bars can suck a tip from that. Very friendly ‚Ä¶

Name: ijsmanschap
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Special and delicious ice cream! Really worth a try, my children (7 and 8) were also impressed ‚Ä¶

Name: ijsmanschap
Review Text: (Translated by Google) The ice cream is super tasty. The Vietnamese Coffee ice cream is very expensive, almost 5 Euro without extra toppings. Hence only 3 stars. They also sell their ice creams at the gas pump much cheaper? ‚Ä¶

Name: ijsmanschap
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious artisanal popsicles. Separate flavors. The popsicles can be dipped in chocolate etc. Very friendly owners. Good service. Good thing. This is one of my favorite ice cream parlors. ‚Ä¶
